invalidDataForm.message: I bought this on recommendation and like a prior reviewer wish I had found out about it sooner.I wish I could afford to have a Latigo for every rifle, but alas I spent all my money on that AK hunt. My rifles will probably be sharing this one for a while. Well, maybe I could afford just one more.
